title: dont play ranked if you cant play all roles
body: i hate getting teammates that says i cant play this role and that role. just today i got second pick and i chose adc and last pick chose adc as well because he cant support. he was like "u mad?" and began to troll and i had to dodge that game.

replies.body: I honestly feel it depends on what elo youre at. Higher elo's regognise the fact that if someone asks for top, theyll generally have alot of experience in that role and will acknowledge that they might be able to do better in it. But i agree with sekai. Minimum amount of roles understood should be 2. But you cant expect to climb playing all 5 roles with a plethora of champions.

If you have said that the minimum benchmark is 2 or 3 roles then I would have agreed with you, but all of them?

Nah man.

Uhh...I'm plat IV and I pretty much play adc exclusively. Every once in a while I get in trouble cause I don't get adc and I have to play another role that I suck at but that's about all there is to it.

I thinks it's fair to say most people in ranked can't play 1 or 2 positions. Personally, I think at least 3 positions, with a few champions in each, is enough for ranked. After all, champion select is the place for all 5 players to sort out their strategy, which includes putting everyone in a position they can handle. Asking people to learn every position is a bit ridiculous, mainly because different positions suit different styles of play. Personally, I'm confident as Top and ADC, capable of Mid and Support, but can't, for the life of me, jungle. I've tried to learn but it's just not suited to the way I play.
